name: Bubble
description: Bubble develops high-temperature compressed-air energy storage to make renewable generation flexible and enduring.
long_description: Bubble is creating a ductile energy system - where flexibility replaces rigidity and renewable sources can expand without congestion. Our technology stores energy as compressed air and heat, using air, steel, and stone. The mission: to catalyse transformation by turning flexibility into strength, abundance into reliability, and the energy transition into permanence.
